subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[yawn]]
# to [[lack]]; to be [[deficient]]
# to [[owe]]
# {{lb|zh|Wuhan}} to [[miss]] somebody

{{zh-der|欠安|欠火|欠佳|欠格:abessive case|欠據|欠款|欠情|欠少|欠伸|欠身|欠條|哈欠|下欠|呵欠|尾欠|只欠東風|呵欠連天|官欠|外欠|七拖八欠|兩不相欠|撇欠|欠資|欠收|打呵欠|懸欠|欠債還錢|欠租|短欠|積欠|欠繳|欠妥|拖欠|欠薪|欠稅|打哈欠|欠揍|欠債|欠契|欠資郵票|欠當|欠事|欠缺|欠好|掛欠|索欠|虧欠|風欠|落虧欠|賒欠|缺欠|手欠|嘴欠}}

{{zh-cat|Elementary}}

subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=4|rs=欠00|kyu=缺}}

# lack, shortage
# to be absent
# vacancy

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: * In modern Japanese, {{ja-r|欠|けん}} is used to spell words that etymologically feature {{ja-r|缺|けつ}}, for example {{ja-r|欠席|けっせき}} < {{ja-r|缺席|けっせき}}. The kanji reading of {{ja-r|欠|けん}} is uncommon and its most notable usage is in the word {{ja-r|欠缺|けんけつ}}, which features both kanji.

subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=[[흠]], [[감]]|eumhun=|rv=heum, gam|mr=hŭm, kam|y=hum, kam}}, ''another original reading:'' [[검]] (geom)

# [[하품]] (''hapum'') [[yawn]]
# [[흉]] (''hyung'') [[defect]], [[deficiency]]
# [[빚]] (''bij, bit'') [[debt]], [[delinquency]]
